Container.Name: ocpp2mqtt
Container.Overview: ocpp2mqtt is a gateway software that converts OCPP (Open Charge Point Protocol) requests to MQTT (Message Queuing Telemetry Transport) and vice versa. This allows the integration of charging stations with any automation system.
Container.DonateText: If you like my work please consider Donating.

Config.Name: OCPP Port
Config.Description: Port mapping for OCPP connection. The host side must match LISTEN_PORT value

Config.Name: LISTEN_PORT
Config.Description: Port to listen for incoming OCPP connection. If this is change, you must update the OCPP PORT port forwarding

Config.Name: LISTEN_ADDR
Config.Description: If using multiple NIC, used to bind to a specific address

Config.Name: MQTT_BASEPATH
Config.Description: Basepath to use for mqtt. State and command will be after that

Config.Name: MQTT_USERNAME
Config.Description: Username to connect to MQTT if required

Config.Name: MQTT_USESTATIONNAME
Config.Description: Set to true (all lower) to append the station name to the MQTT_BASEPATH. Be sure the basepath end with /

Config.Name: AUTHORIZED_TAG_ID_LIST
Config.Description: List of station ID that are authorized to charge. You can get this value in your station apps.
